meanings.definition: A small, precise instrument used to transfer small amounts of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a micropipette to carefully move a tiny drop of liquid.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to handle the micropipette gently to avoid any spills.
meanings.sent3: The micropipette felt like a magic wand, effortlessly moving the liquid around.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the micropipette was like a skilled artist painting with watercolors.
meanings.sent5: The micropipette's delicate tip made it easy to pick up just the right amount of liquid.

meanings.definition: To use a micropipette to accurately measure and transfer liquids.
meanings.sent1: She carefully micropipetted the solution into the test tube.
meanings.sent2: Remember to calibrate the micropipette before starting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: He micropipetted with such focus that it almost seemed like a dance.
meanings.sent4: Micropipetting the solution felt like conducting a symphony of precise movements.
meanings.sent5: The researcher expertly micropipetted each sample, ensuring accurate results.
